merlinakos:
Download the installer directly from manufacturer:
http://autodrivehellas.gr/Auto_Drive_Hellas_v1.25_en.exe
It _only_ supports direct copy to SD cards.
Forgot to comment, that the Find function is not working with this (yet), but at least you can see this map not only on your GPS, but also in MapSource.
